Text: ...Annihilated?!
Y-Yes, sir...!

They were trained soldiers, weren't they?! Are you
saying that nearly a hundred of them were taken out?

Even that girl Annerose couldn't have handled those
numbers...!

Sir...judging from the wounds on the corpses, it
seems there were two other dark knights alongside
Annerose.

One appears to have been wielding an axe and the
other a spear.
A spear...?!
It can't be...
Lord Sergey...?

...What's the status on Annerose's current
movements?

Sir, it seems that she's been keeping a low profile
since the attack. She hasn't conducted any overt
investigations.

Hmph... Having survived so many attacks, is she
finally starting to place higher value on her own
life...?

No... She's the type to meddle and treat
investigations that are supposed to be mere
formalities with undue seriousness.

I find it hard to believe she would stay quiet like
this—continue the surveillance.
Hah!

Upon the onset of possession in Baroness Karen,
an aristocrat born within the Cult,

your actions deviated from the Cult's directives,
resulting in the loss of her whereabouts.

This has, unfortunately, provided the Templars of
the Holy State with an excuse to intervene in the
Empire's retrieval efforts of the possessed.

Furthermore, the Round Table Committee sees it as an
issue that you failed to eliminate the investigation
by the successor of Velgalta's Seven Blades and that
your actions could potentially be traced back.

This includes the irreversible loss of human
resources and assets that could have been
effectively utilized in the Vegalta Empire.
To compensate for this blunder,

you are to swiftly resolve the current situation
using only your discretion.

If the issue is not resolved smoothly and without
delay, there will be no distribution of the "Tears"
for you next year.
—P.S.

There is a possibility that the underground
organization opposing the Cult, known as the
Shadow Garden, is
involved in this matter.

We will spare no effort in providing you with covert
support, even without going through the Round Table
Council.

Tsk... They grasped the situation faster than our
own investigation...!

Those senile old fools from Fenrir... Are they
trying to make me indebted to them...?!

Why would I willingly become a pawn for your
faction!

(Artificial creatures developed for evolutionary
research...and how to control them at will...!)

(The powerful ancient artifact discovered here in
this Sanctuary could greatly change how wars are
fought in this world—)
This ancient power that only I am aware of...!

(...Even without borrowing the power of this
artifact, I won't let those decrepit Rounds get away
with living in such complacency and arrogance.)

(I will surpass humans and dragons alike...!
Compared to the "Key" I possess, the Tears of
Diablos are nothing!)

The Cult! The world! I will make them all kneel
before me...!
